doc.title: The Diary of Preston Plummer
doc.plot: On graduation day and with a bright future ahead of him, Preston Plummer meets a beautiful, young woman named Kate and agrees to drive her home to Amelia Island, Florida - a few hundred miles away. It's on this island that Preston uncovers Kate's dark family secrets and, as the two of them are forced to confront her past, they both must understand the difficulties in their lives and try to find meaning in each other.
